title: Vestal

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose 3 players to Bless.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have basic defense against players you Bless.
- Blessings last a single night.
- All evil Blessed players who attempt to visit another Blessed player will instead be redirected to you.
- If you successfully redirect an evil player to yourself, you are informed.

desc:
Post 5330
*A sister of battle. Pious and unrelenting.*
